meanings.definition: A boat used for towing other vessels.
meanings.sent1: The towboats pulled the stranded ship to safety.
meanings.sent2: The towboats in the harbor were ready to assist any boats in need.
meanings.sent3: The towboats decided to have a race to see who could tow the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The towboats were like loyal workhorses, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The bright red towboats stood out against the blue ocean, a beacon of rescue.

meanings.sent1: Watching the towboats in action was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The towboats efficiently managed the towing of the boats to the dock.
meanings.sent3: The towboats threw a party to celebrate a successful day of towing.
meanings.sent4: The towboats symbolized teamwork and cooperation on the water.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the towboats' engines echoed across the calm waters.
